amendment.description: Amendment prevents the exchange of needles within 1000 feet of schools, day care centers, playgrounds, public housing and other areas which are gathering places for children.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 106-790 to prevent the exchange of needles within 1000 feet of schools, day care centers, playgrounds, public housing and other areas which are gathering places for children.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiahrt amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
